title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module is using Class.forName() method.
EB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module should not use Class.forName() method.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the BidiUtil class in the win32 module.
2. Identify the line that uses Class.forName() method.
3. Modify the line to use static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
4. Verify that the modification does not cause any undesired changes in the behavior.
